title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models as LLM & chat components inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): chat, multi-model, admin panel, file uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with prompt templates, conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that connects to local Ollama, packaged on npm.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or rankers in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express middleware that exposes Ollama endpoints with auth, rate-limiting and OpenAI-compatible routes.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & persistent model storage.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run model tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with Serde types.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with streaming IAsyncEnumerable.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert completions.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel LLM chats.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 GPU instances with CloudWatch and IAM.
